result.execSummary:
The defendant Timothy John KOLBECK was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).
  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

Assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by the Department's assessment process.

Continue with treatment presently involved in. 

Comply with CHIPS order and Injunction.

Submit DNA sample.

timeConds.notes:
Ten (10) days, under the Huber Law, up front.
Eighty (80) days, stayed to be imposed upon the agent's discretion.

Order Modifying Bail.
The provision prohibiting the defendant from having no contact with Devon Kohlbeck is modified to allow the defendant to have contact with Devon Kohlbeck only during joint counseling sessions.

Cover letter.
Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.
Settlement conference with District Attorney reset to 10-01-15 at 11:00 a.m.

Settlement Conference Summary.
Settlement conference with District Attorney is reset to 08/21/2015 at 10 a.m.

Not guilty pleas.  Jury Calendar.   Settlement conference with the District Attorney is set for 07-22-15 at 10:30 a.m.  Plea date is set for 09-23-15 at 2:00 p.m.   Bail is set at $500.00 recognizance bond with the condition that defendant must report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours and defendant is to have no contact with Devon Kolbeck.   Bail furnished.   
Minutes.

RE:  Devon Kolbeck, on 05-11-15.
Initial appearance is set for 07-06-15 at 1:30 p.m.
